metadata.name: !TC - The Lost Items Pack
metadata.description:
A collection of 11 items and 1 heart bundled together, all brought back from the dead!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/fu8tO7l.png[/img] [u]Includes:[/u]
[table] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/WfHurrl.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2785697296]Ancient Revelation[/url][/th] [th][i]Remember what came before[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 4[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/LufpHNZ.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2644368665]Book of Illusions[/url] [/th] [th][i]Army of you[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 4[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/JAPGnTu.png[/img][/th] [th]Lucky Seven[/th] [th][i]Fortune favors the bold[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 2[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/FdlB2Xu.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2762140684]Blank Bombs[/url][/th] [th][i]Enter the basement[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 2[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/K6I3wHb.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2649618240]Pill Crusher[/url][/th] [th][i]Give them to everyone![/i][/th] [th]Quality = 1[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/w3wVqw6.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2796513651]Keeper's Rope[/url][/th] [th][i]Beat the money out of them[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 3[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/sN5l30F.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2805145304]Safety Bombs[/url][/th] [th][i]For your own good +5 Bombs[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 0[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/EWfIfQX.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2678755675]Beth's Heart[/url][/th] [th][i]Faith accumulator[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 1[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/kmdqW8L.png[/img][/th] [th]Checked Mate[/th] [th][i]Chess friend[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 3[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/QH2LG9V.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2800203259]Pacifist[/url][/th] [th][i]Make love, not war[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 2[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/oTbUFGB.png[/img][/th] [th]Voodoo Pin[/th] [th][i]Pain redirection[/i][/th] [th]Quality = 3[/th] [/tr] [/table]
[table] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/MV3Waa1.png[/img][/th] [th][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2644368665]Illusion Hearts[/url][/th] [th]Spawns a clone of the player[/th] [/tr] [/table]
[u]Compatible with:[/u] [list] [*]EID [*]Encyclopedia [*]MiniMAPI [*]Minimap Items [*]GiantbookAPI [*]Fiend Folio [*]Immortal Hearts [*]Sewing Machine [*]Dead Sea Scrolls (Item toggle) [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/SK84PpX.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫, 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198858875349]Akad[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/fly_6]fly_6[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/im_tem]im_tem[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/PixelPlz]PixelPlz[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198330371330]Thicco Catto[/url] [*][u]𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199054232018]ALADAR[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/blindthebounddemon]Blind, The Bound Demon[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/hoofuccingboyherewego]chug all this[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Mattzilla1919]Firework[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url] [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198858875349]Akad[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url],[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198330371330]Thicco Catto[/url] [/list]
